title: Calories in a 10 Piece McNugget
meta_description: Discover calories in a 10 piece McNugget from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and serving tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: McDonald's Chicken McNuggets, standard breaded and fried, no dipping sauce included; based on official nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and exact serving size. Check McDonald's app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A 10-piece Chicken McNugget serving contains 410 calories and 23 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Spicy buffalo sauce instead of plain

faqs.q: How many calories in a 10 piece McNugget?
faqs.a: Approximately 410 calories for McDonald's 10-piece Chicken McNuggets.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 10 piece McNuggets?
faqs.a: About 23 g of protein per 10-piece serving.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Chicken McNuggets?
faqs.a: Yes, around 26 g carbs total, mostly from the breading.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a 10 piece McNugget?
faqs.a: Roughly 860 mg of sodium in the 10-piece order.
No trans fats (0 g) in standard McDonald's Chicken McNuggets.
